name: MVP template
description: this template is for mvp template, include 12 stages

stages.name: stage 1
stages.description: Seller to charter the vessel and send vessel's nomination

stages.name: stage 2
stages.description: Buyer to send documentary instructions

stages.name: stage 3
stages.description: Seller to send draft cargo documents

stages.name: stage 4
stages.description: Buyer to approve or decline draft cargo documents

stages.name: stage 5
stages.description: Seller to load goods onto the vessel and send a notice of appropriation...

stages.name: stage 6
stages.description: Buyer to nominate agent at discharge port, afterNOA is sent

stages.name: stage 7
stages.description: Buyer to approve or decline NOA or cargo docs

stages.name: stage 8
stages.description: When buyer approves the cargo docs, he needs to effect the payment

stages.name: stage 9
stages.description: If there is a demurrage, seller to send all supporting docs

stages.name: stage 10
stages.description: Buyer to approve or decline demurrage supporting docs

stages.name: stage 11
stages.description: When buyer approves demurrage supporting docs, he needs to effect the payment within 2 banking days.

stages.name: stage 12
stages.description: After seller gets the demurrage payment, he declares end of this contract

name: FOB execution template
description: A FOB contract execution template, includes 14 stages

stages.name: stage 1
stages.description: Buyer to charter the vessel and give seller 7 days pre-advise of vessel’s nomination prior to vessel’s arrival to the port of loading

stages.name: stage 2
stages.description: Seller to nominate agent at load port max. 2 days after vessel nomination

stages.name: stage 3
stages.description: Buyer to provide confirmations that Master served 7/5/3 days arrival notices via the agency at loading port

stages.name: stage 4
stages.description: Buyer to send documentary instructions latest 3 days prior to vessel’s arrival at the port of loading

stages.name: stage 5
stages.description: Seller to send draft cargo documents and being approved in 2 days

stages.name: stage 6
stages.description: Seller to load goods onto the vessel and send a notice of appropriation (NOA)

stages.name: stage 7
stages.description: Seller to present all final digital cargo documents

stages.name: stage 8
stages.description: Buyer to effect the payment within 2 banking days after presentation of final digital cargo documents. Payment to be effected in any case before breaking bulk

stages.name: stage 9
stages.description: If there is a demurrage/dispatch (D/D), buyer to send all supporting docs and being approved in 10 days

stages.name: stage 10
stages.description: When seller approves D/D supporting docs, he or buyer (depending if there is D/D) needs to effect the payment max in 30 banking days.

stages.name: stage 11
stages.description: After D/D are settled/paid, the party, receiving the money, declares end of this contract
